name: Bridgify
description: Bridgify, bridges the gap between the hospitality industry and travelers with a white-label solution, delivering the guests a fully personalized trip itinerary, in order to generate ancillary revenue while improving travelers' experience.
one_liner: Bridgify, bridges the gap between the hospitality industry and travelers with a white-label solution, delivering the guests a fully personalized trip itinerary, in order to generate ancillary revenue while improving travelers' experience.
